regen.absent_element: specification of the necessary information in the functional identity aside from train number
regen.new_specification: The functional identity shall include necessary information such as controller ID and call priority besides the train number.

regen.absent_element: specific details on the functional identity's necessary information
regen.new_specification: The functional identity shall include the train number, time of call initiation, and operator ID, if available, to ensure comprehensive identification to the controller.

regen.absent_element: Necessary information in the functional identity should include more comprehensive details.
regen.new_specification: The functional identity shall include not just the train number, but also network status and relevant destination details to comprehensively inform the controller.

label: The functional identity includes the engine number, if no train number is available.
absence: situation of no train number is available
